multiSend(bytes).details: Sends multiple transactions and reverts all if one fails.

params.transactions: Encoded transactions. Each transaction is encoded as a packed bytes of                     operation as a uint8 with 0 for a call or 1 for a delegatecall (=> 1 byte),                     to as a address (=> 20 bytes),                     value as a uint256 (=> 32 bytes),                     data length as a uint256 (=> 32 bytes),                     data as bytes.                     see abi.encodePacked for more information on packed encoding

devdoc.title: Multi Send - Allows to batch multiple transactions into one.
